title: (x) 'Transmorphosis': octogonal caps / Title face? - Far-Marks {Rainer via Mike Y}
content:
[http://img.skitch.com/20100116-jgfmtw9r3phqdd4jhwhtjas8ca.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100119161630/http:/img.skitch.com/20100116-jgfmtw9r3phqdd4jhwhtjas8ca.jpg "http://img.skitch.com/20100116-jgfmtw9r3phqdd4jhwhtjas8ca.jpg")

Would someone kindly tell me what the title face is?
author: zfresh

comments.content: Hmm, I thought it was House Industries' [United Semi Condensed Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20100119161630/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/unitedcollection/viewfonts), but no.

In [this thread\*)](http://web.archive.org/web/20100119161630/http:/209.85.129.132/search?q=cache:N998brC1mPgJ:www.typophile.com/cms/node/65336+site:typophile.com+octogonal&cd=1&hl=de&ct=clnk) the conclusio is a heavied [Far-Marks](http://web.archive.org/web/20100119161630/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/pixymbols/far-marks/) by Pixymbols.

\*) For some reasons I can’t reach the original thread only the google cache …

Florian, maybe that link works for you because you have more permissions than we do. It says "Access denied" to me.

- Mike Yanega
I see. Thanks Mike. I just tried accessing that page in logged-out status, without success. However, after having created a new test account, I can access the page.
